Authors:
Santhiti Vadthanarat, saisamorn - Lumyong, Olivier
Raspe
Title:
Cacaoporus, a new Boletaceae genus, with two new species from
Thailand
Keywords:
atp6, cox3, Fungal Diversity, Taxonomy, Pulveroboletus
group, multigene phylogeny, Boletales
Abstract:
We introduce a new genus, Cacaoporus, which is
characterized by chocolate brown to dark brown basidiomata and
hymenophore. Phylogenetic analyses of a four-gene dataset (atp6, tef1,
rpb2 and cox3) with a wide selection of Boletaceae showed that the new
genus is monophyletic and sister to the genera Cupreoboletus and
Cyanoboletus in the Pulveroboletus group.
